mapper.select: SELECT USERS_NO, ID, NICKNAME, PW, NAME, MOBILE, GENDER, BIRTH_YEAR, BIRTH_DAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, JOIN_DATE, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, SESSION_ID, SESSION_LIMIT_DATE, EMAIL, AGE, PROFILE_IMAGE, PW_MODIFY_DATE, INFO_MODIFY_DATE FROM USERS
